title: Trump's executive order on holidays
shortDescription: President Trump signed an order giving federal workers both Christmas Eve and the day after Christmas off. Presidents typically grant only one of those days.

title: Is Nicki Minaj a Trump supporter? She spoke at Turning Point USA event
shortDescription: Rapper Nicki Minaj expressed support of President Donald Trump at the Turning Point USA AmericaFest. She previously mentioned him in "Black Barbies."

title: Denmark demands 'respect' after Trump appoints special Greenland envoy
shortDescription: President Trump has named Louisiana Gov. Jeff Landry the U.S. special envoy to Greenland. Denmark isn't happy about it.

title: Trump names Louisiana governor as special envoy to Greenland
shortDescription: "Jeff understands how essential Greenland is to our National Security," President Donald Trump wrote in a post on Truth Social.

title: Trump set to expand immigration enforcement in 2026 despite backlash
shortDescription: White House border czar Tom Homan said the number of arrests will increase sharply as ICE expands detention capacity with the new funding.

title: Trump has previewed $2k checks. Here's what Americans think.
shortDescription: USA TODAY Network journalists spoke with holiday shoppers about the prospect of a tariff rebate in 2026.

title: Rally trail: Trump backs 'My Pillow Guy' Mike Lindell for Minnesota governor
shortDescription: The presidentâ€™s words of support for the My Pillow Guy came at a rally in North Carolina. Trump has planned a year of stops ahead of the 2026 midterms.

title: Bill Clinton among VIPs in new Epstein file photographs
shortDescription: The ex-president is among the famous faces shown hanging out with the enigmatic financier, who died by suicide in 2019 amid sex trafficking charges
